attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In recognition of the sterling and untiring work that she and the Gurkha Justice campaigners have done in bringing to an end an injustice that has shamed our country and our government.  She has shown all of us that we can change our country for the better with peaceful and determined protest.  We can again feel proud of our nation safe in the knowledge that we honour our obligations to a truly great group of people who have unflinchingly served our country for centuries and have with their sacrifice safeguarded our freedom.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
